page.title: 14GREENLOANING STABLES
page.content: The correct name is the Scottish Equitation Centre,but no one ever calls it that.There are 52 horses and ponies there.We usually ride the ponies.There is 1 stallion called Donald & a donkey,Sylvie,for the tiny tots who are beginning to ride.There is an indoor & an outdoor school and a jumping paddock.Sometimes we go on a hack to Townhead Farm but we usually stay in the school or in the jumping paddock. I have ridden bareback quite a few times and once I was given a lesson on grooming.In one ride they do not usually have more than 7.Blackie,a retired police horse,is the tallest horse& Punch is the smallest. Panther, Seren & Tiddley Winks are my favourite ponies, Tiddles was the first pony I ever rode.As we get older we go on bigger & stronger horses so that we use our legs.I enjoy riding very much.
